gen:link.msg:message: `AccruedIncome` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesReceivablesBreakdownMaturityEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_AccruedIncome')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesReceivablesBreakdownMaturityEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_AccruedIncome return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesReceivablesBreakdownMaturityEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfAccruedIncomeDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesReceivablesBreakdownMaturityEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfAccruedIncomeDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesReceivablesBreakdownMaturityEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfAccruedIncomeCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesReceivablesBreakdownMaturityEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfAccruedIncomeCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
